subtitle: Trusted by academic teams to keep systems stable, data accurate, and reporting on schedule.

entries.quote: David turned complex admissions and results workflows into dashboards our leadership trusted. His validation checks helped us catch issues early and keep every cycle audit-ready.
entries.name: Kingsley
entries.role: Senior Academic Personnel, Pures College of Technology

entries.quote: His reporting automation shortened our close-out process and improved collaboration with ICT operations. We relied on his documentation and steady hand during every intake.
entries.name: Mobolaji
entries.role: ICT Operations Manager, FUTA Centre for Continuing Education
